term.title: interfering lines

item.text: Radiation from nearby spectral lines may perturb the measurement of the intensity of the line wanted. These lines are termed interfering lines.

term.citation: Citation: 'interfering lines' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.I03092

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
